mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (USER_ID, DOCUMENT_ID, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{documentId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT C.ID, C.USER_ID, C.DOCUMENT_ID, C.CREATED_AT, D.TITLE AS DOCUMENT_TITLE, DC.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME, D.FILE_PATH FROM CART C INNER JOIN DOCUMENTS D ON C.DOCUMENT_ID = D.ID LEFT JOIN DOCUMENT_CATEGORIES DC ON D.CATEGORY_ID = DC.ID WHERE C.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY C.CREATED_AT DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CART WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE ID = #{id} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
